attributes.action: Stop Theresa May from paying the EU 60 Billion Euros as a "Divorce Settlement".
attributes.additional_details: During both World War, over 1.4 Million British and Commonwealth forces lost their lives making sure that Europe is free today.  Not only were there lives lost, but the damage dealt to British cities was very high.
attributes.background:
The PM wants to pay the EU 60 Billion Euros, this is unacceptable, the amount the UK has paid to ensure the freedom of Europe is many times over that figure and thus, nothing should be paid.

No deal is better than a bad deal.
